content: SPX-H Speed X-Change module (inch) Ultimate X-Change module for faster, smoother coring in virtually all types of concrete ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond core bits, X-Change modules, and segments- - - ### FEATURES:Features Highest coring speed – up to 50% faster than previous premium core bits, helping you get the job done earlier Hilti X-Change module system (2 to 8 diameter) enables easy core removal, fast stuck core bit recovery and on-site retipping using just a flat-tip screwdriver Smoother coring – up to 40% less pressure needed on the handle versus previous premium core bits, saving your energy when core drilling all day Versatility – drill in practically every concrete type, including concrete with a high rebar content, using the same core bits Hilti Equidist technology – precisely positioned diamonds for unmatched drilling performance and constant drilling speeds over the entire life of the core bit Applications Replacement diamond segments for compatible Hilti X-Change core bit barrels Rig-based wet coring in virtually all types of concrete ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with: DD 200, DD 250-CA, DD 350-CA Base materials: Concrete Drilling Mode: Rig-mounted Technical Data | For use with | DD 200, DD 250-CA, DD 350-CA | Base materials | Concrete | Drilling Mode | Rig-mounted | Wet or dry operation | Wet | Laser welded segments | Yes | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2329732 -
